description: Try our easy to follow Individual Mixed Berry Swirl Cheesecakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Individual Mixed Berry Swirl Cheesecakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To serve, release the cakes from the moulds by running a knife around the edge. Decorate with berries and mint leaves.
